codeSystems.name: CVDComorbiditiesVS
codeSystems.title: Cardiovascular Comorbidities
codeSystems.description: Valueset that indicate which comorbidities the patient is living with. Select all conditions that apply.

codeSystems.name: ConsciousnessVS
codeSystems.title: State of Consciousness.
codeSystems.description: ValueSet based on the ICHOM standard that indicates the patient's state of consciousness as measured upon arrival at the reference hospital.

codeSystems.name: DiagnosisVS
codeSystems.title: Diagnostic Evidence Base
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that indicates which diagnostic evidence base was used for its realization

codeSystems.name: DischDestVS
codeSystems.title: Discharge Location
codeSystems.description: ValueSet about discharge destination following acute care hospitalization. What type of place was the patient discharged to?

codeSystems.name: EstStrokeSevNIHSSCatVS
codeSystems.title: Estimated stroke severity using the NIHSS.
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that intended to categorize the severity of the stroke based on the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS).

codeSystems.name: GenderIdentityVS
codeSystems.title: Gender Identity
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for Gender Identity based on LOINC.

codeSystems.name: LiveAloneVS
codeSystems.title: Live Alone Pre-Stroke
codeSystems.description: ValueSet indicating whether a patient lived alone prior to a stroke event based on ICHOM terminology.

codeSystems.name: LivingLocPostVS
codeSystems.title: Patient's Residence Post to a Stroke
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that represents the patient's most recent place of residence after the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

codeSystems.name: LivingLocPreVS
codeSystems.title: Patient's Residence Prior to a Stroke
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that represents the patient's most recent place of residence before the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

codeSystems.name: NoYesUnknownVS
codeSystems.title: Yes, No and Unknown
codeSystems.description: ValueSet with responses Yes, No, and Unknown

codeSystems.name: PROMIS10VS
codeSystems.title: PROMIS-10 Response Questionnaire
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the PROMIS-10 (Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System 10-item short form) Questionnaire.

codeSystems.name: SMRSqVS
codeSystems.title: Simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (SMRSq)
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire.

codeSystems.name: SmokingStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Smoking Status
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for Smoking Status. A person's current and past smoking behavior.

codeSystems.name: StrokeAmbVS
codeSystems.title: Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Ambulation
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Ambulation.

codeSystems.name: StrokeDressingVS
codeSystems.title: Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Dressing
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Dressing.

codeSystems.name: StrokeToiletingVS
codeSystems.title: Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Toileting
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that defines the response values for the Prestroke and Poststroke Functional Status: Toileting.

codeSystems.name: StrokeTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke type based on ICHOM
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that aims to categorize the stroke type according to the ICHOM standard.

codeSystems.name: SymtDurVS
codeSystems.title: Duration of Stroke Symptoms
codeSystems.description: ValueSet that categorizes the duration of stroke symptoms, considering the time from symptom onset to admission at the reference hospital.
